title: Reverse Engineering Poly TC8 Part 1
shortDescription: Diving into embedded linux, Android debugging tools, and hardware reverse engineering.

title: Reverse Engineering Poly TC8 Part 2
shortDescription: What is SELinux, how can we see what's running on our device and kill processes to get a persistent shell.

title: Reverse Engineering Poly TC8 Part 3
shortDescription: Firmware extraction, understanding the file structure, and retrieving the device tree to make a custom linux image.

title: Converting PDF's to EPUB's
shortDescription: Sometimes Calibre auto-conversion doesn't work well so here's my workflow for converting PDF's to EPUB's!
